files.name: index.js
toggle-group-item.svelte
files.content:
<script>import { ToggleGroup as ToggleGroupPrimitive } from "bits-ui";
import { getToggleGroupCtx } from "./index.js";
import { cn } from "$lib/utils.js";
import { toggleVariants } from "$lib/registry/default/ui/toggle/index.js";
let {
  ref = $bindable(null),
  value = $bindable(),
  class: className,
  size,
  variant,
  ...restProps
} = $props();
const ctx = getToggleGroupCtx();
</script>

<ToggleGroupPrimitive.Item
	bind:ref
	class={cn(
		toggleVariants({
			variant: ctx.variant || variant,
			size: ctx.size || size,
		}),
		className
	)}
	{value}
	{...restProps}
/>

files.name: toggle-group.svelte
files.content:
<script>import { ToggleGroup as ToggleGroupPrimitive } from "bits-ui";
import { setToggleGroupCtx } from "./index.js";
import { cn } from "$lib/utils.js";
let {
  ref = $bindable(null),
  value = $bindable(),
  class: className,
  size = "default",
  variant = "default",
  ...restProps
} = $props();
setToggleGroupCtx({
  variant,
  size
});
</script>

<ToggleGroupPrimitive.Root
	bind:ref
	class={cn("flex items-center justify-center gap-1", className)}
	bind:value={value as any}
	{...restProps}
/>
